casebody.data:
Kevin Scott KARSJENS, et al., petitioners,
v.
Emily Johnson PIPER, et al. No. 16-1394. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 2, 2017.

*107Motion of Association for the Treatment of Sexual Abusers for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.
